attributes.action: make a conserted effort to rid our roads of illegal cars.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government need to focus more on the illegal cars that are driven on our roads, rather than trying to charge law abiding citizens more. Most of these illegal cars are not fit to be on the road and are usually driven by idiots.  Rid our roads of these cars and the problems with road rage and congestion will be better.
